title: Buddhism is Kinda Out There, Man

media:group.media:description:
Super duper new book, Geometry for Ocelots (you might need to change your region) ► https://tinyurl.com/2e44sbdb

The rest of my books ► https://tinyurl.com/ycnl5bo3

For sending personalised insults ► https://www.facebook.com/exurb1a/ 
Help me to do this full-time if you're deranged enough ► https://www.patreon.com/exurb1r?ty=h

If you’re interested in Buddhism, this is some stuff I certainly got a kick out of over the years: 

So, a massive amount of this video came from a lecture series by Malcolm David Eckel. You can listen to it here, and no - no one's sponsoring me for this, it's just ace - https://www.audible.com/pd/Buddhism-Audiobook/B00DDUVALC

Also:

My favourite version of the Dhammapada, the sayings of the Buddha - https://youtu.be/4afDXAvbl0A

A great written intro to Zen -  Zen Mind Beginner's Mind by Shunryu Suzuki - https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/402843.Zen_Mind_Beginner_s_Mind

Another brilliant intro to Zen by Alan Watts - https://youtu.be/f7F_SGCnVdI

Act Normal (a great documentary about a Western Buddhist monk) - https://vimeo.com/27590176
